definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Furthermore, the expression of MMP9 in tumor tissues was positively associated with the MVD val-ue.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤組織中MMP9的表達與微血管密度呈正相關。

sentences.english: The microvessel basement membrane changes with age might be the one of the mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 微血管基底膜的增齡變化可能是其機制之一。

sentences.english: Conclusion Diabetic microvascular complication is one of the risk factors of lacunar infarction.
sentences.chinese: 結論糖尿病微血管病變是腔隙產生的危險因素之一。

sentences.english: The count of microvessel was the fewest in genistein group.
sentences.chinese: 各組微血管記數結果金雀黃素組最少。

sentences.english: A large number of proliferating macrocapillaries coursed among them.
sentences.chinese: 有大量的增殖性巨大微血管橫列在這些組織之間。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between microvessel density and tumor size in pituitary adenoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討垂體腺瘤中微血管密度與腫瘤大小的關係。

sentences.english: The reaction in soft tissue healing process contains microvascular responses and inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 軟組織對鈍器傷的反應包括微血管反應和炎症性過程。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Instant lateral head rotation is capable of leading to the damage of cerebral microvessels in structure.
sentences.chinese: 結論頭顱瞬間側向旋轉可致腦微血管結構損害。

sentences.english: We investigated preoperative predictors of microvascular invasion.
sentences.chinese: 我們檢測了微血管浸潤的作用。

sentences.english: Morphology of microvasculature of infant lateral geniculate body and visual cortex;
sentences.chinese: 目的分析幼兒外側膝狀體微血管的形態結構。

sentences.english: The afferent arteriole was often traveled in the central part of the area of the polar cushion cell.
sentences.chinese: 極墊細胞區的微血管與腎小球的微血管直接延續。

sentences.english: The afferent arteriole was often traveled in the central part of the area of the polar cushion cell.
sentences.chinese: 極墊細胞區的微血管與腎小球的微血管直接延續。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse the microvascular morphology and architecture of lateral geniculate body(LGB).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析幼兒外側膝狀體微血管的形態結構。

sentences.english: Microvessel count was a significantly independent prognostic factor.
sentences.chinese: 微血管數是顯著獨立的預後因素。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the structure of micro vessel in Houhai point and its relationship with meridians and collaterals.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索穴區內微血管構築及與經絡腧穴的關係。

sentences.english: Afer acupuncture, the pathological changes of micrangium were improved.
sentences.chinese: 針刺後觀察，其微血管病變得到改善。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
